title: 10 Countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
There is a difference of 83.0 between the maximum Country Philippines and minimum Country Burma (Myanmar).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated Christian population in millions for 10 number of Countrys.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
There is a difference of 83.0 between the maximum Country Philippines and minimum Country Burma (Myanmar).
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
Country Philippines has the highest Estimated Christian population in millions and Burma (Myanmar) has the lowest Estimated Christian population in millions.
The second highest Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the Country China.
The highest Country Philippines has 83.0 more Estimated Christian population in millions than the lowest Country Burma (Myanmar).
Country Philippines is higher than any other Countrys with value 86.79, followed by China, and India. Down to Country Burma (Myanmar) with the lowest value 3.79.
The highest value 86.79 at Philippines is almost 3.35 times larger than the average value 25.88.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 258.81.
